x3 – x2 – 6 = 0
  
(a) show that 2.2 < α  < 2.3
(2)

to f (x) = x3 – x2 – 6 to obtain a second approximation to α , giving your answer to 
3 decimal places.
  
 
(5)
  
(c) use linear interpolation once on the interval [2.2, 2.3] to find another approximation 
to α , giving your answer to 3 decimal places.
